Comments_List: How to organize and manage large quantities of information in short periods of time.
I learned a lot about the basics of chemistry that are critical to a larger understanding of the sciences.
How to learn on my own

Strengths: Smaller class size than term-time course definitely makes it easier to engage and keep on top of everything

Weaknesses: Problems assigned from the textbook often included concepts professor said were not important, or emphasized things way differently than professor Cramer did. Explanations in class were sometimes confusing.
i think it's good as it is
There needs to be more time on tests and the expectations for any graded work needs to be made clear at the beginning.
The professor did not really teach, went on a lot of rants. TA didnt seem too invested in helping the students.
Yes, good efficient way to meet med school requirements
